attributes.action: reject latest N.I.C.E. guidelines on complementary and alternative "medicine"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Despite hundreds(homeopathy)and in some cases thousands (Chinese herbal medicine)of years of existence these therapies have been unable to prove their ability to cure any disease in a clinical setting and therefore should not be available on the NHS.
Once a therapy is proved, it stops being alternative or complementary and simply becomes medicine.  Supporting unproven therapies is waste of public money which could be spent on real medicine that actually works as well as giving a veneer of respectability to pseudoscience.
